whitelist.title: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Mapping of chain IDs to whitelisted contracts and their allowed function selectors.

whitelist.ui:description: Use chain IDs as keys. Each chain ID maps to a set of contract addresses.

additionalProperties.ui:description: Use contract addresses as keys. Each contract maps to an array of function selectors, which may include specific selectors and/or a wildcard '*' to grant permission for all functions on that contract.
